priority_actions.issue: Hardcoded Gaode Maps API key in 13 Python scripts
priority_actions.impact: API key exposed in repository - security risk
priority_actions.fix: Remove hardcoded key, use environment variable only

priority_actions.effort: Low - move files with git mv
priority_actions.fix: Move to docs/reports/2026-01/, docs/guides/, docs/reference/ with kebab-case naming

priority_actions.issue: ~1700 lines of duplicate content between commands/ and skills/
priority_actions.fix: Keep one canonical version, reference from other location

priority_actions.issue: 200+ lines of executable JavaScript in documentation

priority_actions.impact: Scripts fail if venv not activated manually
priority_actions.fix: Update all examples to show 'source /root/.claude/venv/bin/activate && python...'

priority_actions.issue: 3000 lines of verbose documentation (Best Practices, Philosophy, etc.)
priority_actions.fix: Apply 'rules not stories' principle, reduce by 40-45%

critical: Hardcoded API key in 13 Gaode Maps scripts
Hardcoded API endpoints in 5 Duffel scripts
major: Missing venv activation in 30+ documentation examples

verbose_patterns: Best Practices sections with code examples (belongs in developer guides)
Verbose API response examples (should show key fields only)
Tutorial-style walkthroughs instead of reference format
Exhaustive category/reference listings (should be external links)
Quality Standards and Architecture Overview sections (belongs in /dev.md)

immediate: Remove hardcoded API key from Gaode Maps scripts (Security)
Move 15 root .md files to proper docs/ locations (Organization)
short_term: Extract inline JavaScript to Python scripts (Standards)
Update all documentation to show venv activation (Reliability)
Extract POI Category Codes to external reference (Conciseness)
long_term: Apply 'rules not stories' to reduce 3000 lines of verbose docs (Quality)
Create templates/ directory and extract HTML template (Maintainability)
Add pre-commit hook to detect hardcoded secrets (Security)

phase_1_file_organization.description: Move misplaced files and delete build artifacts
actions: Move 15 root .md files with kebab-case renaming
phase_1_file_organization.impact: Clean root, proper organization, 0.23 MB freed

phase_2_security_and_reliability.description: Fix critical security and reliability issues
actions: Remove hardcoded API key from 13 Gaode Maps scripts
Extract hardcoded API endpoints from 5 Duffel scripts
Update 30+ documentation examples to show venv activation
Extract inline JavaScript from documentation to Python scripts
phase_2_security_and_reliability.impact: Secure API keys, reliable script execution, maintainable code

actions: Apply 'rules not stories' to 14 verbose files (reduce 2800-3000 lines)
Extract POI Category Codes to external reference
Move Architecture/Quality Standards from plan.md to /dev.md
Compress API response examples to show key fields only
phase_3_documentation_quality.impact: Clearer documentation, easier maintenance, faster reading

safety_notes: README.md is official Claude Code file - MUST stay in root
All __pycache__ directories are in .gitignore - safe to delete
All misplaced docs are 0-1 commits old - low risk of breaking references
RedNote skill is actively used - docs are functional
No temporary/one-time scripts detected - all scripts are functional
Git checkpoint will be created before any destructive operations
